alert.note: Alert for Lamar; Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 29 at 11:02PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pickens and southern Lamar Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1101 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Steens, or near Columbus, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Millport, Kennedy, Ethelsville, Blooming Grove, Crossville, Cody, Shaw, Star, Hightogy, Forest, Melborne and Macedonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for west central Alabama.
